mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_sportsplan s LEFT JOIN t_user u ON s.userID=u.id
SELECT s.* FROM t_sportsplan s LEFT JOIN t_user u ON s.userID=u.id WHERE s.userID=#{id}

SELECT s.id,s.userID, (s.masterPlanIntake/s.planUseDays) intakeEverday, (s.masterPlanCarbon/s.planUseDays) carbonEverday, (s.masterPlanCellulose/s.planUseDays) celluloseEverday, (s.masterPlanPro/s.planUseDays) proEverday from t_sportsplan s WHERE s.userID=#{id} AND s.planEndDate is NULL AND (s.planType=1 or s.planType=3 )
SELECT tb.burnCaloriesPer,ti.dayIntake FROM t_todayburncalories tb,t_todayintake ti WHERE tb.userID=#{userID} AND ti.userID=#{userID} AND tb.date=#{date} AND ti.date=#{date}
